biotools.summary: This allows to perform alignments between one or more sequences and a database (all the sequences, even in the DB, are intended to be proteinic). It is implemented in the recently released CUDA programming environment by NVidia.

bioschemas.name: SWCuda
bioschemas.summary: This allows to perform alignments between one or more sequences and a database (all the sequences, even in the DB, are intended to be proteinic). It is implemented in the recently released CUDA programming environment by NVidia.
